generated_body: If you click on the article titled "Cows swept away by Hurricane Dorian found alive but how?", you may expect to read about the unexpected survival of cows that were displaced by the hurricane. The article is likely to detail the circumstances under which these animals were found, including the efforts made by rescuers or local farmers to locate them. It could also explore the impact of the hurricane on livestock and the broader implications for agricultural practices in hurricane-prone areas. The piece may provide insights into the resilience of these animals in extreme conditions.
